scripts.k6-smoke-testing: docker run -e K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$K6_CLOUD_TOKEN -e K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID -v /home/circleci/project:/tmp/Cypress.io -i loadimpact/k6:latest cloud /tmp/Cypress.io/k6/smoke-testing.js
